description:
The 7th Universe is desperate for a tenth member, so Goku seeks out Frieza as a potential candidate. In the 6th Universe, Cabba and Caulifla try to goad Kale into training with them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 10 Ninme no Senshi wa Omee Da! Gokuu Freezer no Moto e!!
10人目の戦士はおめえだ! 悟空フリーザのもとへ!!
Der zehnte Kämpfer bist du! – Goku besucht Freezer!
You`re the Tenth Warrior! Goku Goes to See Frieza!!
